fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, affirm a player's action, granting them roleblock, redirect, and control immunity, as well as making their action astral.
- At night, you may take the blame for a target, redirecting all visits from them to yourself. You can choose as many targets as you want. This can be multitasked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You start the game knowing who the CEO is.
